original_text: But Samuel said, ‘What makes the Lord happy? Which is better? Is he more pleased when people offer burnt offerings and sacrifices to him? Or is he more pleased when people obey him? Listen! It is better to obey the Lord than to offer sacrifices to him. That is true even if you offer to him the best animals that you have.
korean_text: 사무엘이 이르되 여호와께서 번제와 다른 제사를 그의 목소리를 청종하는 것을 좋아하심 같이 좋아하시겠나이까 순종이 제사보다 낫고 듣는 것이 숫양의 기름보다 나으니

sentences.original_text: Is he more pleased when people offer burnt offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 번제를 드릴 때 그가 더 기뻐하시는가

sentences.original_text: Or is he more pleased when people obey him?
sentences.korean_translation: 아니면 사람들이 그에게 순종할 때 그가 더 기뻐하시는가?

sentences.original_text: It is better to obey the Lord
than to offer sacrifices to him.
That is true even if you offer to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신이 그에게 드리더라도 진실된 것이다

sentences.original_text: the best animals that you have.
